summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Ray Street and West Ray Street from the east margin of Second Avenue north, to west margin of First Avenue west, et al in the City of Seattle, by grading under Ordinance No. 20421, creating Local Improvement District No. 2016 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
